title: AUSTRALIAN MOVIE -  The Black Balloon (2008)
description:
AUSTRALIAN MOVIE 

 The Black Balloon (2008) 

Thomas is turning 16. His dad's in the army and they've just moved to a town in New South Wales; his mom is pregnant; his older brother, Charlie, who's autistic, has his own adolescent sexual issues. Thomas finds Charlie an embarrassment in public, so when Thomas is attracted to Jackie, a girl in his swim class, Charlie presents any number of obstacles when she drops by their house, when the three of them go for a walk, and during a family birthday dinner. Can Thomas find a way to enter the world of teen romance and still be his brother's keeper, or is Charlie's disability going to prove more than Thomas can handle? Director: Elissa Down. Stars: Rhys Wakefield, Luke Ford, Toni Collette, Erik Thomson, Gemma Ward.

English subtitle file included in torrent.
